articles.title: As the Mac turns 40, a tip of the hat to Mr. Macintosh - TechCrunch
articles.description: Steve Jobs once commissioned Belgian artist Jean-Michel Folon to come up with an illustrated character that would "live" in every Mac machine and surprise the owner: Mr. Macintosh, aka Mac Man.
